en.title: Frequently Asked Questions
en.description: Find answers to common questions about FLUX.1 [dev]

items.question: What is FLUX.1 [dev]?
items.answer: FLUX.1 [dev] is a 12 billion parameter rectified flow transformer capable of generating images from text descriptions. It's designed for developers and researchers to explore and build upon.

items.question: How can I get started with FLUX.1 [dev]?
items.answer: Getting started is easy! We provide a reference implementation and sampling code in our dedicated GitHub repository. Developers and creatives can use this as a starting point for their projects.

items.question: What are the usage terms for FLUX.1 [dev]?
items.answer: Generated outputs can be used for personal, scientific, and commercial purposes as described in the FLUX.1 [dev] Non-Commercial License. The open weights are available to drive new scientific research and empower artists.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.description: 查找有关FLUX.1 [dev]的常见问题解答

items.question: 什么是FLUX.1 [dev]？
items.answer: FLUX.1 [dev]是一个120亿参数的整流流变压器，能够从文本描述生成图像。它专为开发者和研究人员设计，用于探索和构建。

items.question: 如何开始使用FLUX.1 [dev]？
items.answer: 开始使用非常简单！我们在专门的GitHub仓库中提供参考实现和采样代码。开发者和创意人员可以将其作为项目的起点。

items.question: FLUX.1 [dev]的使用条款是什么？
items.answer: 生成的输出可用于个人、科学和商业用途，符合FLUX.1 [dev]非商业许可协议。开放权重可用于推动新的科学研究并赋能艺术家。
